update_content: I was overjoyed to discover that this book I had liked when I was in high school was even more charming and lovely than I remembered.

book.title: THE SECRET OF SECRETS
book.description: As he searches for the missing noetic scientist he has been seeing, Robert Langdon discovers something regarding a secret project.
book.author: Dan Brown

update_content: I started remembering why I gave up on reading these kinds of thrillers. I can't stop reading it, but God, its really so fucked up that I want to throw up.

book.title: THE BLACK WOLF
book.description: The 20th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. After thwarting a terrorist attack, an injured Gamache leads a covert investigation.
book.author: Louise Penny

update_content: An NPR Best Book of 2023 “full of cinematic and wild suspense” that “would be great for fans of Andy Weir”

book.title: THE INTRUDER
book.description: During a rough storm, Casey puts herself in danger when she lets a girl, who is covered in blood, into her cabin.
book.author: Freida McFadden
